import React, { useState } from 'react'; import styles from './landing.module.scss'; import Randomizer from '../randomizer/Randomizer'; import cc from '../../assets/images/cc.gif'; import vb from '../../assets/images/vb.jpg'; import f50 from '../../assets/images/f50.png'; import { Carousel } from 'react-responsive-carousel'; let array = [cc, vb, f50] const Landing = (props) => { const [ project, setProject ] = useState(); const handleShowProject = (e, project) => { setProject(project); } const handleClick = (e) => { } return (
Wipawe here. [ pronounce wip-pah-wee] People call me Wippy tho. I like to design as much as I like to code. Preferably, I would like to do both at the same time.
